title: Peanut Butter Pretzel Granola Clusters
source: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
categories: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
directions: Line a baking sheet with foil. In a medium saucepan, heat the peanut butter chips until melted and smooth, about 3 minutes. Add the granola and pretzels and stir until coated. Transfer to the lined baking sheet and freeze for 15 minutes. Break into clusters. Store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
